UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Anti-antimicrobial Peptides: Folding-Mediated Host Defense Antagonists
Literature.Author: Bryan L, Lamarre B, Diu T, Ravi J, Judge PJ, Temple A, Carr M, Cerasoli E, Su BC, Jenkinson HF, Martyna GJ, Crain J, Watts A, Ryadnov MG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=1.28±0.04µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1.55±0.01µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=6.33±0.12µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=25.9±0.06µM),Micrococcus luteus NCIMB 13267(MIC=0.36±0.10µM)
